body_html: Can you add the custom collection to the current graph (e.g. with tf.add_to_collection)? Then it will get picked up and saved automatically (collection_list=None defaults to get_all_collection_keys()).
body_text: Can you add the custom collection to the current graph (e.g. with tf.add_to_collection)? Then it will get picked up and saved automatically (collection_list=None defaults to get_all_collection_keys()).
body: Can you add the custom collection to the current graph (e.g. with `tf.add_to_collection`)? Then it will get picked up and saved automatically (`collection_list=None` defaults to `get_all_collection_keys()`).
